{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12155v1", "title": "On a category of chains of modules whose endomorphism rings have at most
  $2n$ maximal ideals", "summary": "We describe the endomorphism rings in an additive category whose objects are
right $R$-modules $M$ with a fixed chain of submodules $0=M^{(0)}\leq
M^{(1)}\leq M^{(2)} \leq \dots \leq M^{(n)}=M$ and the behaviour of these
objects as far as their direct sums are concerned.", "main_category": "math.RA", "categories": "math.RA", "published": "2025-04-16T15:03:19Z"}
